pages.text: The $(mob)Deathword$() is a flying monster that spawns underground in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It is vulnerable to Fire, but is immune to falling damage. It attacks players on sight by summoning up to 4 undead monsters as minions. When it is no longer able to spawn minions, it will engage its target at close range, throwing sheets of paper.
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Book Bag$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open the bag and receive a random enchantment book.
